snippet: The government needs to press schools and the loan servicing companies to educate students on affordable partial payment plans.
abstract: Editorial contends federal student loan default data released by Education Dept underscores need for government to continue pressing both schools and loan servicing companies to educate students on plans that can keep them out of default; calls on government to crack down on predatory student loan practices, particularly at for-profit schools.
lead_paragraph: The government needs to press schools and the loan servicing companies to educate students on affordable partial payment plans.

headline.main: What to Do About Student Loan Defaults
